thread.title: BRIEF-Entermate to issue 2nd series convertible bonds worth 5 bln won

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Entermate to issue 2nd series convertible bonds worth 5 bln won
text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Entermate Co Ltd :
* Says it will issue 2nd series unregistered and unsecured private convertible bonds, to raise 5 billion won in proceeds for operations
* Maturity date is Jan. 26, 2021, coupon rate is 0 percent and yield to maturity is 3 percent for the bonds
* Conversion price is 1,820 won/share and conversion ratio is 100 percent
Source text in Korean: goo.gl/MXEDze
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
